reviews.text: While attending the recent Cowboy Poetry Gathering in Elko, Nevada, we stayed at the Esquire Motel - one of the older-styled motels with a great neon sign and located within walking distance to the Old Pioneer Hotel/Western Folklife Center; Capriola's - famous western store since the 1920's; Stockman's & The Commercial casino's - as well as a couple of nearby watering holes/saloons - this motel is in the heart of town.
reviews.title: Very Nice Budget Motel
